detectors.description:
Lottery (shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#3-49) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- bets.push(Bet(msg.value,block.number,won)) (shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#26)
detectors.markdown:
[Lottery](shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#L3-L49) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- [bets.push(Bet(msg.value,block.number,won))](shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#L26)

detectors.description:
Lottery.makeBet() (shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#23-33) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- won = (uint256(keccak256()(block.blockhash(block.number - 1),now)) % 2) == 0 (shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#24)

Lottery.getBets() (shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#35-41) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- i < bets.length (shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#38)
detectors.markdown:
[Lottery.getBets()](shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#L35-L41) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [i < bets.length](shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#L38)

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected won = (uint256(keccak256()(block.blockhash(block.number - 1),now)) % 2) == 0 (shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#24):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [won = (uint256(keccak256()(block.blockhash(block.number - 1),now)) % 2) == 0](shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#L24):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

detectors.description: Loop condition i < bets.length (shared/bad_randomness/lottery/lottery_4round.sol#38) should use cached array length instead of referencing `length` member of the storage array.
